publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6477 Shona Robison: The National Health Service (Reimbursement of the Cost of EEA Treatment) (Scotland) Regulations 2010—That the Health and Sport Committee recommends that the National Health Service (Reimbursement of the Cost of EEA Treatment) (Scotland) Regulations 2010 be approved. Supported by: Nicola Sturgeon*

S3M-6477 Shona Robison: The National Health Service (Reimbursement of the Cost of EEA Treatment) (Scotland) Regulations 2010—That the Health and Sport Committee recommends that the National Health Service (Reimbursement of the Cost of EEA Treatment) (Scotland) Regulations 2010 be approved. Supported by: Nicola Sturgeon
